title: Madjax's mega club sandwich
ingredients: ['3 slices toast (white or brown or use a combination of your favourites)', '1 to 2 slices of smoked salmon', '1 to 2 tablespoons of cottage cheese', "3 bacon rashers (any type - use your favourite - it's your sandwich!)", 'fried chopped fresh mushrooms', 'lightly fried sliced onions']
